mapper.select: SELECT s_idx as sIdx, u_idx as uIdx, s_title as sTitle, s_content as sContent, s_datetime as sDatetime FROM sur_survey order by s_datetime asc
mapper.insert: insert into sur_survey( s_title, s_content, u_idx) VALUES(#{sTitle}, #{sContent}, #{uIdx} )

insert into sur_question( q_kind, q_content, s_idx) VALUES
(#{item.qKind}, #{item.qContent}, (SELECT s_idx FROM sur_survey ORDER BY s_idx DESC LIMIT 1) )
insert into sur_item( q_idx, i_content, s_idx) VALUES(#{question.qIdx}, #{question.iContent}, #{sIdx} )
